response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. With its advanced features and unparalleled quality, it's truly an investment in excellence. I believe in its value and am confident it will bring significant benefits to you. Considering its exceptional capabilities and the time and resources we've put into its development, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to purchase it for $12,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible value while also compensating us fairly for our efforts. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you with this remarkable product.", "product_price": 12000}
